subject: Broken power supply cable
description_text:
My power supply cable stopped working properly, it sits loose when inside
the control box, I put it in DC input, as I should, everything correct but
it sits loose and the pedals are loosing response now, only go to 35, 50%
and 33%. If you can send a new Control box and power supply cable, because
I don't know which is the wrong one, maybe both, email me back. Awaiting on
your response

conversations.body_text: Hi Geek77,  Please take a photo to show the issue and also provide your order number for further checking.

Here are the photos, you can see that it sits very loose and it's always
falling. I bought it from aliexpress, do you also fix it?

A sáb, 10 de jan. de 2026, 1:27 p.m., service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> escreveu:

> Hi Geek77,
>
> Please take a photo to show the issue and also provide your order number
> for further checking.
>
>
>

Hi Geek77,  Could you please provide your order number? Also, please try placing the control box in a more stable position to prevent it from shaking, and use a zip tie to secure the power connector to avoid a loose connection. After that, please test again and let me know if it improves.
